title: How are tones detected on the phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: When you push a button a tone/sound is generated. The different sounds are made of pairs of tones: 1 = 697 Hz + 1,209 Hz 2 = 697 Hz + 1,336 Hz 3 = 697 Hz + 1,477 Hz 4 = 770 Hz + 1,209 Hz 5 = 770 Hz + 1,336 Hz 6 = 770 Hz + 1,477 Hz 7 = 852 Hz + 1,209 Hz 8 = 852 Hz + 1,336 Hz 9 = 852 Hz + 1,477 Hz * = 941 Hz + 1,209 Hz 0 = 941 Hz + 1,336 Hz # = 941 Hz + 1,477 Hz
